code: function shuffle(array){var _array=array.slice(0);for(var i=0;i<array.length-1;i++){var randomIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*(i+1));var temp=_array[i];_array[i]=_array[randomIndex];_array[randomIndex]=temp;}return _array;}export default function initializeDeck(){var id=0;var cards=['react','javascript'].reduce(function(acc,type){acc.push({id:id++,type:type});acc.push({id:id++,type:type});return acc;},[]);return shuffle(cards);}
